question: Specify that the animation of the <div> element should alternate between running forwards and backwards.
correct_input: <head>    <style>     div {    animation-name: example;    position: relative;    width: 150px;    height: 150px;    background-color: black;    animation-duration: 4s;    animation-iteration-count: infinite;    animation-direction: alternate;} @keyframes example {  0%   {background-color: purple; left:0px; top:0px;}  25%  {background-color: blue; left:0px; top:200px;}  50%  {background-color: purple; left:200px; top:200px;}  75%  {background-color: blue; left:200px; top:0px;}  100% {background-color: purple; left:0px; top:0px;}} </style> </head> <body> <div></div> </body>
